CustomField.description: Field to check if the batch process need to be checked the record or not.
CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(AV_ExternalID__c), 'NotToBeProcess', IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(AV_ExternalID__c)), ISBLANK(AV_Task__c) ), 'ToBeProcess', AV_ExternalID__c ) )
CustomField.label: Proceso Batch - Regularizar HCA
